amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions in the bill taken from H.R. 2898 which are related to California State water projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike General Provisions, Department of the Interior, related to California state water projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 247 (Roll no. 242).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 247 (Roll no. 242).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. McNerney.
